hotelManagementDesc: Is a desktop application designed to facilitate the management of a hotel. This application allows for detailed record-keeping, control, and monitoring of all hotel operations.
hotelAppDesc: Mobile application for tourism. This application allows you to find restaurants, bars, nightclubs, etc.. It also allows you to see the events taking place in the city.
nextjsLoremIpsumDesc: Lorem Ipsum Gen is a web application that allows you to generate Lorem Ipsum text boxes. Developed as a personal practice and test of myself.
snakeGameAppDesc: Snake Game mobile application. This application was developed as an Android programming practice and as a hobby.
reactMarkdownPreviewerDesc: Markdown Previewer is a web application that allows you to preview markdown text. Developed as an internship for FreeCodeCamp
randomPhraseGeneratorDesc: Random Phrase Generator is a web application that allows you to generate random phrases.
pokeGalleryDesc: Poke Gallery is a web application that allows you to view pokemon by consuming the PokeAPI API.
cryptoPriceRustDesc: Crypto Price Rust is a terminal application that allows you to view the price of cryptocurrencies by consuming the CoinGecko API.
rocketApiDesc: Rocket API is a REST API developed in Rust that allows to create, read, update and delete users. With non-relational database and security system supported in Json Web Tokens.
